Senior Product Manager - Growth

Innovate Labs | Remote (US) | Full-time

Job Reference: PM-GROWTH-2024

Who We Are
Innovate Labs is a fast-growing B2B SaaS startup revolutionizing how businesses manage their operations. Backed by top-tier VCs, we've achieved 300% YoY growth and are expanding our product team.

The Opportunity
As a Senior Product Manager for Growth, you'll own the user acquisition and activation funnels. You'll work closely with engineering, design, marketing, and data science to drive key growth metrics.

What You'll Do
• Define and execute the product roadmap for growth initiatives
• Analyze user behavior data to identify opportunities
• Run A/B experiments and measure impact
• Partner with marketing on acquisition campaigns
• Build and mentor a team of associate PMs
• Present strategy and results to leadership

What We're Looking For
• 5+ years of product management experience
• Track record of driving measurable growth outcomes
• Strong analytical skills and data-driven mindset
• Experience with experimentation frameworks
• Excellent communication and stakeholder management
• Background in B2B SaaS preferred

Salary Range: $160,000 - $190,000 + bonus + equity

Our Perks
- Fully remote work environment
- Competitive salary and equity package
- Health, dental, vision coverage
- $1,500 annual learning stipend
- Home office setup allowance
- Quarterly team offsites

Application Process
1. Initial screen with recruiter
2. Product sense interview
3. Technical/analytical case study
4. Leadership panel interview
5. Reference checks

We encourage candidates from all backgrounds to apply!
